career.name: QDoc Inc.
career.title: Back End Developer
description: Worked on the implementation of a software solution that automates scheduling through the integration of medical APIs.

Designed the UI for the scheduling system at the Minor Illness and Injury Clinic and integrated data from multiple EMRs using AWS serverless functions, resulting in streamlined operations, improved scheduling accuracy, and reduced workload for medical teams. This reinforced my ability to build cloud-based, user-centered solutions.

career.name: Red River College Polytechnic/Winnipeg Jazz Orchestra
career.title: Full Stack Developer
description: Developed a unique software solution for the Winnipeg Jazz Orchestra, which involved collaboration across the entire development life cycle.

Facilitated meetings, gathered requirements, and created user personas to design the UI for the Winnipeg Jazz Orchestra. This improved my ability to create designs that meet user needs, boosting engagement and usability for student musicians.
